suncertify.business

Class RMIRemoteSubcontractorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.business.DefaultSubcontractorService
      • suncertify.business.RMIRemoteSubcontractorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, RemoteSubcontractorService, SubcontractorService

    public class RMIRemoteSubcontractorService
extends DefaultSubcontractorService
implements RemoteSubcontractorService
    RMIRemoteSubcontractorService is an RMI implementation of the remote business service interface RemoteSubcontractorService. It also extends DefaultSubcontractorService and therefore has access to all of the business service functionality resulting in no code duplication. The remote interface contains a single method to start the server on a specific port. This is implemented in this class by exporting this object (which is a DefaultSubcontractorService object) to the RMI Registry thus making it available to receive incoming requests from clients
    Author:
    Kieran O'Brien

      • startServer

        public void startServer(int serverPort)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteSubcontractorService
        This method should export the server implementation as a remote object to make it available to receive incoming requests on the specified port. Note: The server will be run on localhost
        Specified by:
        startServer in interface RemoteSubcontractorService
        Parameters:
        serverPort - The port in which the server will be hosted to allow remote requests to be made

        java.rmi.RemoteException
